Text.Page:
We have a timber quota to fill, and we've made almost no progress in the last few days.

Lennert back in Lumbertown doesn't listen to excuses. He's a hard man, but I see his point. Our soldiers on the front don't want to hear excuses, either.

If we can just get our crews back into the forest..."What can I do?"

You don't look like much of a woodcutter, but like I said, woodcutters are useless if they can't get to the trees.

Instead of cutting down trees, how about you cut down some {@LinkCreature:2#3#centaurs}?

I'll pay for each mane you bring back. Kill enough, and maybe they'll get the hint.

I've never seen the centaurs gallop away so fast. They'll be back, but I'll send crews out right away

At least we'll make progress today...thanks to you, .
Kill the {@LinkCreature:2#3#centaurs}, okay? It ain't teleport science!
